## hc_colors
Adding color options to highchart objects

#### Description 

An array containing the default colors for the chartâ€™s series. When all colors are used, new colors
are pulled from the start again.

#### Usage
<pre><code>
hc_colors(hc, colors)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 

* ``hc ``: A highchart htmlwidget object.
colors A vector of colors.

##### Examples
```{r}
library("viridisLite")
cols <- viridis(3)
cols <- substr(cols, 0, 7)
highcharts_demo() %>%
hc_colors(cols)
```
